sentences.en: a look of intense dislike
sentences.cn: 极端厌恶的表情

sentences.en: Danny returned to Father's house in a state of intense agitation.
sentences.cn: 丹尼回到神父的房子时显得极为焦虑不安。

sentences.en: He gazed at me with those intense blue eyes.
sentences.cn: 他用那双深邃的蓝眼睛凝视着我。

sentences.en: He took an intense interest in all religious matters.
sentences.cn: 他对所有宗教事宜都很感兴趣。

sentences.en: He was sweating from the intense heat.
sentences.cn: 高温酷热让他大汗淋漓。

sentences.en: His love life was complicated, and involved intense relationships.
sentences.cn: 他的爱情生活很复杂，几段感情都是轰轰烈烈。

sentences.en: I felt so self-conscious under Luke's mother's intense gaze.
sentences.cn: 在卢克母亲审视的目光下，我感到极不自在。

sentences.en: Intense balls of flame rose up into the sky.
sentences.cn: 炽热的火球冲上天空。

sentences.en: She is a very physical young woman, earthy, and very intense.
sentences.cn: 她是个很粗犷的年轻女子，快人快语，非常热情。

sentences.en: She is taller than I imagined, more adult, more intense.
sentences.cn: 她比我想象的更高、更成熟、更热切。

sentences.en: Stevens's murder was the result of a deep-seated and intense hatred.
sentences.cn: 史蒂文斯遭谋杀源于深仇宿怨。

sentences.en: That was the cue for several months of intense bargaining.
sentences.cn: 那意味着几个月的激烈谈判开始了。

sentences.en: The door was beginning to buckle from the intense heat.
sentences.cn: 门在高温高热下开始变形。

sentences.en: The intense fighting is reported to have claimed many lives.
sentences.cn: 据报道激烈的战斗导致很多人丧生。

sentences.en: the intense heat of the desert
sentences.cn: 沙漠的炽热

sentences.en: The job demands intense concentration.
sentences.cn: 这工作需要全神贯注。

sentences.en: The military on both sides are involved in intense activity.
sentences.cn: 双方的武装力量都有密集动作。

sentences.en: The pain was so intense I couldn’t sleep.
sentences.cn: 疼得我都睡不着觉。

sentences.en: The woman's figure is sharply brought out by the intense light.
sentences.cn: 在强光照射下，那女子的身材清晰可见。

sentences.en: This has been the subject of intense scholarly debate.
sentences.cn: 这一直是学术讨论的热门话题。

sentences.en: Young people today are under intense pressure to succeed.
sentences.cn: 如今的年轻人面临要出人头地的巨大压力。

words.tran_cn: 加强的；集中的；透彻的；加强语气的
强度，烈度；加强，加剧；紧张
强度；强烈；[电子] 亮度；紧张
使加强，使强化；使变激烈

trans.tran_cn: 强烈的，紧张的，激烈的，热切的，洞悉一切的
trans.tran_en: having a very strong effect or felt very strongly
